values:
you know what really sucks....

feeling like shit...

being lied to...

loving someone that doesn't love you back...

not being able to get over things...

and someone who says they care about you and love you but really don't and would rather see other people than you...

it really sucks...

i need to get drunk. who wants to get drunk with me?  i wanna have a good time i'm sick of crying. I"M DONE!

where the fuck is sara?
we're supposed to go out and do something
but she's buying a fucking halloween costume
apparently from JAPAN

we're going camping this weekend
heather bought too much shit
8 boxes of fucking gushers
she's nuts

me
hojo
chelle
sara
k. decline
daigle
ria

HELL YEAH

beer pong
joint pong
kegger!
no boys!
what's up awesome weekend?

or next year. 

goodbye.

Hey guys guess what i'm online weird isn't it... i totally forgot how to use this thing, and i forgot my username. i'm dumb, but anyways Happy Birthday Heather Ashley and Lora. i hope you guys had awesome days. I know heathers little get together was awesome, bowling balls plus the street add a little bit of Dom, Heather, Chad, Ashley and Lacey and that equals an awesome time. Also taking sweet pics. I love my friends to death. Basically my life consists of the same things with a little change of scenery but its still a very fun time. This summer should be awesome i'm really excited Tanica falls here we come...lol i'm excited to tent camp i've never done it before it should be awsome. E's party friday BEER PONG! and great friends (mostly) hell yeah i love it, Well since this is only LJ and i'm not up to date with the sweet new my space journal no one will prob even read this but i did it for steve, so i hope everyone has a splendid day this is boring me and i prob won't update for another 6 months so have nice lives...:)

fuck guys
fuck drama
fuck the rain
fuck it being cold
fuck going to tops
fuck being drunk
fuck being stoned
fuck 16 year olds
fuck chocolate
fuck apples
fuck blueberries
fuck honey
fuck phish (the guy)
fuck delta sonic
fuck belly buttons
fuck fuck fuck fuck


i love heather, sara, lacey and ria. 

alright. im out. 


ps. (this is sara updating)

Welll i haven't updated in a really long time, i'm at melissa's right now and we might "go out to dinner with carl and eric" lol yesterday was fun two shows in a row Catch 22 (i got the drumstick) Me and Melissa also ran away...it was fun except the sleeping in a car with 4 people me and eric in the front carl and mel in the back...i've been having lots of fun. i love our new friends and i was to give my V card away very SOON!! i like eric alot....

Wow i haven't been online in so long and my computer is fucked up and i'm pissed. nothing i had saved is there anymore i had saved is there anymore i'm pissed...well the past while has been fun met A TON of people and they think we're austalian its funny. but annoying these boys keep calling my phone. they still don't know i'm not australian. i've been to canal fest alot and hangin out with michelle heather katie c melissa and ashley. Today i went to the res with adam and michelle and melissa and dana. also went to a time to strikes show. it was ok. not worth $5 though. o well. i guess thats the price you have to pay to hang out with those kids. i'm excited catch 22 show in a few day or a week or something. but its soon. Matt asked me out today...ewww. why? o well its all good hes not THAt bad but hes just annoying i don't know what to tell him. Tev. "Whats the deal?" "Wassubi" "YES!" "Zess" wow today was fun i've missed kelissa so much. i hope i have a good day tomorrow. goodnight

Well yesterday was pretty fun! except for that dumb counseler that wants me to talk to her, she wants to go on walks with me and talk. i don't want to talk to people i don't know that don't give a shit about me or know nothing about me. i see no point in it. i wish i could talk to someone that accually cared. o well...so yesterday went to the river with lora heather steve and michelle. we met up with mike and carl. it was pretty fun untill we got kicked out by the cops. then we hung out in the parking lot of mississippi muds and then left. We went and visited gary and got free donuts from p&r it was sweet. I love that i can go home whenever when we're with lora its sweet. well i think i'm going to canal fest in a little with Katie, Michelle, Heather, Ashley, and Jay. It should be tons of fun.

Wow today was great, i hung out with katie and Michelle for a while then we met up with melissa and went to ashleys for a while. After that me katie and chelle walked to micheals and got some stuff. After that Melissa and Carl and Ben(hottie) lol picked us up and we also picked up another boy on the way. and we went to Erics house. It was fun we chilled for a while and walked up to the point it was sweet. There was also a boy named Mike and another boy named Eric and some other boy but i don't remember his name. and of course i was atracted to ben the kid from PA. I always go for guys that won't work out o well. I had a really good time i'm glad i went. We have to hang out with those boys more often...

Well, yeasterday i hung out with josh Samulski we drove around for a while and went to his house and played basketball and picked some mint leaves out of his garden (they taste really bad) Then i went to group with michelle, after group we went to the mall Me Michelle Bill and Katie Cline. We got some nice stuff i got a bob marley shirt and some underwear and stuff. We met this really wierd boy named chas he got us cigs though. and he pocked(sp?) us it was wierd. Then we went to mighty and watched the skaters. Today i hung out with michelle and katie and bill we went shopping at the mall. Then went to the salvation army. i got this sweet zerbra skirt. After that we minus katie went to michelles and then i went home. I went out to dinner with the fam. Then went shopping with my mom i goit some new bathing suits and new shoes it was nice. After that i hung out with michelle and we went to might. Then met up with d and josh i haven't seen them in a mad long time. So we chilled at the gazibo then went home tomorrow i'm going Downtown with michelle and katie i'm really excited!

Well today was pretty fun. I hung out with katie michelle and melissa. We went shopping. Then i had work it was so boring! But we got new kids menus and they are fun cuz we get to play guess who. After work i went up to mighty with michelle katie and melissa. We watched <3 Jerry <3 skateboard, he is really cute. and has nice hands lol. After mighty i came home, and my dog is chasing a fly around the house its funny. Tomorrow is the 4th of july i'm excited open house!

Well yesterday was a really good day! In the morning i went to Alex's memorial service it was was... then afterwards i met up with katie michelle and bill. We went to katies house and watched cops to hot for tv it was funny! The i had DC and afterwards went back to katies. We had some "soccer" lol it was pretty fun. we jumped off her garage again and i loved it! Katie and i got a little sick. i made myself throw up alot it sucked but made me feel better! Then i don't really remember what else happend. I remember adam calling and then he showed up at katies and so did nicole and melissa. I was holding Buddy (the bird alot) i love that bird! i kept kissing it lol. Then we left and went to the res. with Adam and went to some school and i was laying on the steps with a wamr blanket and bil lit his socks on fire (he does that alot) then we all went home it was a very good day!

well today was a very good day. i hung out with melissa nicole michelele dave and bill for while we watched detroit rock city in michelles basement good movie. then everyone left i had softball boy do we suck i played first base iut was xi. Then i met up with melissa and michelle and nicole and we went to katie clines and played a little bit of "soccer" lol it was so much fun! we went behind rizzos and we also went to wilson then went back to her house and jumped off her garage into her pool it was so much fun! i can not wait for the 4th of july!!!! it will be great jkatie cline is amazing!!! i'm so excited right now 4th of july will be so much fun! i love my friends! that b-o-y called me today i dunno fi i should hang out with him i just want to see him dance lol. o well.... i'm so ti. goodnight

Well today was the Reel Big Fish/ Catch 22 / Big D and the Kids table show. It was amazing. I went with Lora Gary Heather and Kelli. we left around 1:30-2. "this is a one time thing" "i've never said that" lol (car ride convo)  It took a while to get there but when we got there we walked around for a while. We went to urban clothing it is an amazing store! i want to go back there and just shop! We also went into the edge radio thing and there was a huge spider on heather and i flipped out. Then we looked for something to eat for mad long and finally found this mall with alot of food. I was so full after that. Then we walked around a bit more. saw some kids having a picnic with pigeons lol. saw some crack whore ya know crazy people. Then finally we went to the show it was tons of fun and we met cute boys. I met this one boy Brian, wow was he hot! Too bad he lives in canada :( o well we had a good time while it lasted! i'm so glad he talked to me because i kept looking at him and telling kelli how hot he was and he came over to me and started talking to us. It was so cute too he was singing to me and shit o it was a great time i loved it i hope i get to see that boy again. The drive home was ok, heather tried to kill us by swirving and me and gary were flipping out. We listened to shania twain really loud and sang to it, it was fun lol. We also took a little detour thanks to heather lol o well it was ok. I had such a great day! i'm so glad i got to go!

Well today was a good day i love katie cline and michelle! first i had to wrok it wasn't that bad then i had allisons graduation partay and michelle and katie came over for that it was kinda boring but it made it fun with michelle and katie. there were alot of people i did not know but o well. We went to curtis and wrote alot of shit and mrs young was there it wa screepy then we went to katie clines house it was so much fun. HAPOPY 1 YEAR MICHELLE i loevy ou! so we went to katies and then we went in the basement and listenied to music and stuff it was fun then we went to "wilson farms" well we really did and got some drink then went behind rizzos for a really long time it was fun we talked alot then we went up to mighty and found a scooter i had fun playing on it and we also talked to the hot skate borders!! they were sweet. there was some college kid and we talked to him and looked at everyones hands and ryan shone has the best hands by far thge other 2 were close but they were sweet they made us o lol it was fun alot of people were up there and then we left i'm so glad we still hang out with katie cline she is god lol. wow i'm so glad i know who my real friends are. and i love it! well tomorropw is the reel big fish show catch 22 and bid  d and the kids table will be there i'm pretty excited!!! its in canada! i'm so excited! today was such a great day it finnally happend  after 3 night of trying! well i'm going to go now goodnight  
RIP Alex W. :(

Well today was a good day. I went to michelles with Melissa and Katie C. we hung out there for a while. Then Heather came and got us but melissa had to go home. So then we went to Get Greg and Ashley and we drove to deleware park. We watched some sword fights and played on the playground, then we went to glen falls it was fun! I love that place! We started a fire it was nice. We then all went home, we listened to sweet music in the car it was nice. Now i'm very bored with nothing to do it sucks :( o well tomorrow we're watching breakfast club in DC. I'm excited!

Well tuesday I went to a ska show it was amazing, I got a fat lip but it was all ok because there were so many good looking guys there. I went with Melissa, Michelle, Nicole, and Courtney and met up with Adam, Heather, and Steve. It was a really fun show. The Planetsmashers and The Aquabats were there and some german chick that I wanted to shoot in the face. Yesterday Me Melissa Michelle and Nicole went out to eat at applebees, and afterwards we went to kmart and got cool things out of the 25cent machines. Then we climbed the rock pile and me and nicole threw stones at birds. After that we went to target and melissa and nicole got sweet hand warmers i want some also nicole got a cape its sweet. Then we went back to michelles and attempted to study for global. I think i failed because i suck at global o well. Today we had that exam and then i had group counseling, we get to watch the breakfast club next week i'm pretty excited. Then i hung out with chelle and "studied for bio" that didn't happen but i did finish my curtains. Tomorrow will suck because i have an exam (hopefully me and chelle will go to josh's in the morning) then i have a couselour meeting and 4, then i have to work. O well hopefully i'll get out of work early.

well today was a good day...i hung out with michelle, and nicole and melissa. It was really fun! We have to hang out with nicole more she is a fun girl. We went to mighty and wallgreens. I love riding bikes! It is so very fun! Then we rode nicole home. And went back to michelles. Then Josh come over and we hung out he is a good friend. I also started making my cutains and i'm very excited about them.. Wow i am so happy that i have relized i do not need drugs anymore i feel smarter than people now, it makes me very happy. And i don't want to be around people that can't have fun while not on drugs, and i don't want to be around people that only talk about drugs, its annoying and it makes me so angry. but tev i'm in a good mood and i'm happy so i don't care anymore, we need to meet some new people (preferebly hot boys) at this show! yes! i'm excited!

xkd25xxxxxxxxxx's LJ stalker is he_atomizes!
he_atomizes is stalking you because they heard you are awesome in bed, and they want to find out. They are also prank calling you regularly!

LiveJournal Username:

LJ Stalker Finder
From Go-Quiz.com Well my day was pretty sucky at first and then it turned out to be a great day... at first I got in this huge fight with my sister because shes a bitch as we all know. and I am obviously a slut/whore/dyke so whatever. Shes a crazy bitch! Then I had my english exam, after that we went to michelles. Then me michelle melissa and mrs brown went to a cancer walk in grand island. We flirted with boys in an suv on the way there it was funny. The cancer walk was really fun we only walked a little. We were mostly looking for cute boys. We also went in the woods which was amazing I shimmied (sp?) up a tree which I was very proud of myself for doing...We also climbed this wall cuz there was an obstical course it was sweet. We also walke the log and made a tee-pee out of branches. It was amazing I want to go back there and hang out. I found a frog and named it vera and carried it around for a while, and freaked melissa out with it lol. We also spun in the huge field and played frisbee with our glowsticks. Then this band was playing TBS and I got real excited and this one boy was so cute! We finally found the cute boys and I asked them the name of their band and they wouldn't tell me(they were playing hard to get) so we figured out that they were just homosexuals. We accepted they didn't want us to drop dome. Tev...then we just ate hot dogs and left I had a great day! I'm glad I can have fun without drugs! :)

Well things have been going a little better I guess. I had group counseling yesterday I accually liked it I thought it would be alot different, but it was cool the people there are cool. This one boy Blake I think is very good looking. I want to get to know him, and this other boy I forget his name I think matt. He likes punk music and shit, so I think we will go to shows together and def. warped tour. I gave him my number so its pretty cool, tomorrow in group we get pizza(cuz its this one boys last one)! i'm pretty excited. I just hate the peeing part that sucks. But other than that I dunno just been hanging out with Michelle and Melissa. I had a softball game today our team is pretty bad. I hit the ball a few times I was proud, but i'm so used to playing with the retards that I guess I just suck. o well, I like playing with the retard better anyways. I wish so bad I could go to D's and use "nessy" lol. I miss my friends so much. I also wish pat would go back out with me but that doesn't look so good, I think Samalski gave up on me I dunno? We never really did get to hang out. Maybe we will at some point in the summer and i'll "use him for a piece of ass" right ashley? lol well I dunno 1 day left of school i'm excited. I have to go study for global now, which I will probably fail anyways. If anyone want to tutor me thats good in global please try cuz i need help. Peace out

Wow this sucks so much, i really hate it. Today i worked it was ok since i had nothing better to do and i get paid $9 an hour cuz its a holiday so it was ok. I wish all my friends would come over so i wouldn't be going insane right now i just basically constantly cry for no reason and just feel like hsit all day. the only thing i need is my friends right now but i can't even leave my house, i'd just like to be able to walk out of my house and not get in trouble for leaving, but i guess i brought this all on myself i wish my friends knew how horible a feeling this is you really don't know how bad it sucks until it happens to you. i went to Taking Back sunday, the used and blink yesterday i'm surprized i got to go my mom wasn't going to let me. So we went to darien for the day and saw taking back sunday and the used on the superman. The show was sweet, i missed most of TBS because steve wasn't allowed in the show because of his jacket and i decided to be nice and stay with his sister chelsea. so we watched them from the lawn. i love them they will be at warped tour so i'm not that sad about missing them. then the used was amazing i love them, and blink so really cool they had these screens in the back and shit it was sweet. we had some drunks behind us they werre pretty funny. and travis disapeared off stage and apeared behind us and we all stood on our chairs and watched him do a drum solo it was amazing! so i'm glad i got to go. i wish so badly i could see D, Ashley, Dwane, Greg, Josh, Pat, Grant, and all of my friends and i wish i could go to edison and play gladiator that would make me so happy to bad it won't happen:(

This is so fucked up, i had drug counseling (first drug test ever) today i knew this day would come but i didn't expect it so soon. this is insane, by the end of the summer i wouldn't be surprized if i was in a mental institute seriously i can not take this much longer it has only been one day and it feels like forever i can't handle this. Its already driving me insane this is just making things worse i need to get away from here and as fast as posible. My parents are making this seem way worse than it really is, they don't understand. i just feel that by the end of summer if i keep feeling like this i'll kill myself, seriously. i need my friends so bad right now and yet i can't even see most of them (if they really ever were my real friends) i guess i'll know who my real friends are now. i feel so shitty right now, will this feeling ever go away? i hope it does and soon! i hope this whole thing goes away.  FUCK THIS SUCKS! someone call me tomorrow please...

why does everyone that doesn't do drugs assume that all "druggies" are "worthless" everytime anyone writes anything in a journal or says anything about"druggies" its always "worthless druggies", if i'm so worthless then why do you even care enough to read my journal or talk to me online or comment on my journal? i would really like to know this. and i'm sick of everyone getting into my buissness when they have nothing to do with anything. also those of you who have never tried drugs can't say shit to me about doing them. You have no idea and never will untill you have tried they really aren't as bad as you think. I don't give all you sXe people a hard time so why must you give me such a hard time? get over it its not your life i'm "fucking up" its mine and i can make my own choices. i don't need people that don't even give two shits about me and could careless if i died (coughAJcough) to comment and just be rude and say stupid shit that i really don't need to hear. i just had to say that, anyways i went to glen falls the other day for the first time it was so amazing! i went with Greg, Ashley, Dwayne and Pat. it was so pretty and we had alot of fun. we also climbed melissa's treee which had to be done it was nice. I worked tonight from 5-10 and i work tomorrow night at 5-10 also. and i'll have till like 12:30-1 if anyone wants to hang out because i'll probably get ditched again. and end up walking around by myself which sucks but o well. someone call me tomorrow if you wannt hang out...peace

Today was like the best day ever! i loved today michelle and melissa would understand. it was crazy. i got a little disapointed because of something but i didn't even worry about it. we hung out at our house (the gazibo) it was pretty sweet we met up with katie c and kurt and sam and they looked so wierd from far away it was fucked up.then me and melissa laid in the rocks and stared at the clouds it was crazy we saw the gateway to heaven, it was amazing. wow i can't even decribe the way i felt today!

wow things have been going really good lately. i love it. i love my friends they are amazing. we're goin on a trip this weekend i'm very excited!!! :) it should be fun. um today i hung out with ashley pat michelle melissa dee larry nikita and bob a little bit of everyone. i worked also with danielle it was fun. i'm still goin out with pat :) um nothing too exciting has been going on just pretty much hangin out with the whole crew. The other day was bad when 2 of my friends were arested which sucks i will kill heather (fat chick with glasses?) shes a bitch. but anyways i'm excited about tomorrow it should be fun or saturday i'm not sure when yet but it will rock

Wow this weekend was amazing. Friday was really good i loved it. Me Katie Melissa Ashley Michelle and Sam went to the bridge and it was a very good time. i had fun then i think we just chilled at d's. then yesterday was mad fun! Me Melissa ashley and chelle were at melissas for a while d stopped by. we sat in the backyard for a really long time. it was really nice though i loved it. then d left and me melissa chelle and ashley went up to the gazibo and we took our shoes and socks off and ran around in the mud it was sweet. we chilled there for a while then d met up with us and bob and nikita got us and we drove up to the river it was mad sweet the fog looks so cool over the water and shit. me and melissa again took off our shoes. and me melissa and ashley had to pee real bad so we did in some ditch type thing but its a good thing we did cuz we were in the car for so long! then today started off bad but turned out ok. me and michelle met up and went to the gazibo and chilled for a while the went to d's house and pat ashley d bob and nikita were there. we chilled then headed over to pats house but michelle went home for her fam party. We chilled at pats till about 9:15 and me and ashley walked home. i work at denys now so i'll have money which is sweet. peace

Wow i haven't been online in mad long, but o well its all good. school tomorrow which sucks, but yeah nothing new has really been goin on lately, i'm going out with pat now. and i went to the trussels the other day with ashley pat dwayne and greg. it was some good times. other than that same old shit. but its all good because i love bein with the people i'm with so it all works out. peace

wow alot of shit has gone on since i last updated. i went to florida it was fun i got some sweet shit there. but now that i'm back it seems like i'm just fucking everything up. when i got back to the airport i seriously flipped out like people were staring and shit my dad was about to take me to the hospital and call the cops and shit. i was scared and i was alone i felt like i need to be alone though it was wierd shit there was only one person i wanted to be with. but they weren't there :( i just wish my life made sence again i seriously need to talk to someone right now i need this one person. i need help also. i dunno what my life is becoming but its not lookin good. o well yesterday was pretty sweet with a few minor exceptions i'll get over it whatever people are people. i've been basically hanging out with Ashley Melissa D Pat and Collin. i haven't seen michelle in like 2 weeks i'm in michelle withdrawl rigth now i need to see her! well i dunno i really need to talk to one specific person right now i'm gonna go i love all my friends thank you for making me feel better all the time.

Well i haven't updated in a while. um tuesday i hung out with aj tried to figure things out but i'm still really confused. wednesday i have no idea what i did i think i might have gone to dans with sarah. thursday i hung out with michelle melissa ashley greg josh sam kurt and courtney. We walked around and stuff it was a fun time. On friday i had Jamie Panns birthday party is was fun. There were alot of people there it was Me Sarah, Jamie, Heather, Dan, Tim, Dennis, Dave, Justin, Nicole, Eric, Amber, Trina, and i think that was it sorry if i forgot someone there was alot of people to remember but we watched big daddy i fell asleep cuz i was really tired then we walked around in a huge group it was crazy, Jay st. is now my fave. street i love it its so narrow and sweet. But then yesterday i hung out with michelle ashley and melissa we watched jim breuer hardcore its so funny i love it! i want to go see him so badly!! Then we walked to my house in the rain and chilled there and ate and played pictionary and cut ashleys hair and we were being really fem. Then we walked to courtneys house and hung there for a little, and then tim called and invited us over so vince came and picked us up and we hung out in tims basement with him vince and phil. Then we watched the wall for a little and then went home it was a good day. i also am very excited for florida now!!:) i can't wait 2 weeks!!!

Well yesterday was my bday party, it was fun but then everyone left and i was sad :( and tim and steve stole my moms cupcake container and she was pissed and she was bitching at me and i got really mad. and then today she found out something and shes being really gay about it. and shes making it a way bigger deal than she should. i think i might just leave i dunno i need time away from everything and everyone at my house they piss me off alot and i hate all this shit i really need friends right now. fuck.

Well today turned out to be ok i guess, i got some gifts from the rents i got a sweet 16 necklace (which i'll porb never wear) a few charms for my bra(clett) portable solitaire and a bunch of gift cirtificates to mighty and mcdonalds and dq. and they got me more stuff which is like way to much, i take my parents for granted and i really need to stop and appriciate the things they do for me, they would do anything for me and not all parents are like that so i thank them for being the best parents i could ever ask for. after i opened presents sarah pann called so i went to guitar center and then we also went to salvation army and media play and the mall with her. It was fun, lol i fell over behind the dumpster, and my gumball was a good buy lol. i guess i had an ok day. but the one person i needed to talk to today didn't talk to me :( which really sucks and makes me really even more upset because i really need someone to talk to! i need someone to understand me. "how long will i slide? separate my side, i don't believe its bad slittin my wrists is all i ever had"

Wow today really sucks, i hate this! crying on your bday really sucks. i think i'll just go watch uptown girls since i love that movie. I liked the cards i got today from katie and chelle, i love those girls! hopfully tomorrow will be fun. the one thing i want most i know i'll never get and it sucks alot. i'm going to go now i'll write later maybe something good will happen.

Well today i went to the doctors after school and it was really stupid and pointless, but now i have to go see a counselor. So that will suck but o well. After that i came home and talked to tim and he said we was gonna come down and visit. So i was like alright he ended up calling me at about 8 or so and i went and met up with him and we walked up to mighty. Then we walked back to my house and stopped at ians on the way and he walked with us for a while. I had a pretty good day it was funny. Tim stayed here till about 11 and he just left steve picked him up. Now i'm really tired and probably should try to get some sleep.

well today was a fun day. After schol i had to clean. Then afterwards i called sarah and then dan and me and sarah went to hang out with dan, and tim dennis and aj were also there.
